org.jooq
Interface TableLike<R extends Record>

All Superinterfaces:
QueryPartProvider, java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
Select<R>, SelectConditionStep, SelectFinalStep, SelectFromStep, SelectGroupByStep, SelectHavingStep, SelectJoinStep, SelectLimitStep, SelectOrderByStep, SelectQuery, SelectWhereStep, SimpleSelectConditionStep<R>, SimpleSelectFinalStep<R>, SimpleSelectLimitStep<R>, SimpleSelectOrderByStep<R>, SimpleSelectQuery<R>, SimpleSelectWhereStep<R>, Table<R>, UpdatableTable<R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
TableImpl, UpdatableTableImpl
public interface TableLike<R extends Record>
extends QueryPartProvider

An object that can behave like a table (a table-like object)

Author:
Lukas Eder

Method Summary
 Table<R> asTable()
          The underlying table representation of this object This method is useful for things like SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM x WHERE x.a = '1') WHERE ...
 Table<R> asTable(java.lang.String alias)
          The underlying aliased table representation of this object This method is useful for things like SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM x WHERE x.a = '1') [alias] WHERE ...
 
Methods inherited from interface org.jooq.QueryPartProvider
getQueryPart

This method is useful for things like SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM x WHERE x.a = '1') WHERE ...

Table<R> asTable(java.lang.String alias)
The underlying aliased table representation of this object

This method is useful for things like SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM x WHERE x.a = '1') [alias] WHERE ...
